snippet: Three studies are starting early next year with the same goal: finding a way to head off the disease with early intervention.
abstract: Scientists select three different types of Alzheimer's drugs to be tested in the first large-scale international attempt to prevent the disease in people who are predisposed to get it; study will involve 160 people from the United States, Britain and Australia with a variety of gene mutations that cause Alzheimer's with absolute certainty; drugs were chosen for the best effectiveness and the least likelihood of dangerous side effects.
lead_paragraph: Three studies are starting early next year with the same goal: finding a way to head off the disease with early intervention.

headline.seo: Alzheimer’s Prevention Studies to Test Three Drugs
